Concatenate Factory

Concatenate Creative Circle is the place to discover and cultivate your unconventional creative talents!

Glass Crafting

Previous Next

SWANK SPACES

The Concatenate Creative Circle houses studios and workspaces from Web designers to Welders and a few other creative types in-between. We have dedicated photo studios, pottery studios, welding foundries, offices and classrooms.

COOL CLASSES

Have you ever wanted to learn glass blowing? Maybe welding is more your speed. Or perhaps photography is your wheelhouse. Concatenate is the place to learn! We have world-class instructors who not only teach but are award-winning experts in their respective fields.

MEMBERSHIP

Consider becoming part of the Concatenate Creative Circle family! Our benefits include an amazing online community, flexible classes, space leases and payment plans, Mentoring programs, virtual events, Pizza fridays and unlimited water, coffee and juice!
